text: Bernard Tomic was the defending champion but chose not to defend his title. Former world No. 1 Andy Murray played at the tournament and he won his first singles match since hip surgery. In the third round, he lost to Matteo Viola. Emil Ruusuvuori won the title after defeating Viola 6–0, 6–1 in the final. ==Seeds== All seeds receive a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ==References== *Main Draw Rafa Nadal Open Banc Sabadell - Singles
title: 2019 Rafa Nadal Open Banc Sabadell – Singles
